name: Compound Finance
description: Compound is an algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol that allows you to lend and borrow crypto. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native COMP token.

en.name: Compound Finance
en.description: Compound is an algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol that allows you to lend and borrow crypto. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native COMP token.

fr.name: Compound Finance
fr.description: Compound est un protocole algorithmique, avec des taux d'intérêts autonomes qui vous permet de prêter et d'emprunter des cryptos. Les utilisateurs peuvent participer à la gouvernance du protocole par le biais du jeton natif COMP.

es.name: Compound Finance
es.description: Compound es un protocolo de tasa de interés algorítmico y autónomo que permite prestar y tomar prestadas criptomonedas. Los usuarios pueden opinar sobre la gobernanza del protocolo con su token COMP nativo.

de.name: Compound Finance
de.description: Compound ist ein algorithmisches, autonomes Zinssatzprotokoll, das es dir ermöglicht, Kryptowährungen zu verleihen und zu leihen. Die Nutzer können mit dem nativen COMP-Token ein Mitspracherecht bei der Protokollführung haben.

pt.name: Compound Finance
pt.description: Compound é um protocolo de taxas de juros algorítimico e autônomo, que permite que você empreste e tome emprestado cripto. Usuários pode ter voz na governança do protocolo com o seu token nativo COMP.

el.name: Compound Finance
el.description: Compound is an algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol that allows you to lend and borrow crypto. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native COMP token.

tr.name: Compound Finance
tr.description: Compound, kripto ödünç vermenize ve ödünç almanıza izin veren algoritmik, özerk bir faiz oranı protokolüdür. Kullanıcılar, yerel COMP belirteci ile protokol yönetiminde söz sahibi olabilir.

vi.name: Compound Finance
vi.description: Compound is an algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol that allows you to lend and borrow crypto. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native COMP token.

zh.name: Compound Finance
zh.description: Compound is an algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol that allows you to lend and borrow crypto. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native COMP token.

hi.name: Compound Finance
hi.description: Compound एक एल्गोरिथम, स्वायत्त ब्याज दर प्रोटोकॉल है जो आपको क्रिप्टो को उधार देने और उधार लेने की अनुमति देता है। उपयोगकर्ता अपने मूल COMP टोकन के साथ प्रोटोकॉल शासन में अपनी बात रख सकते हैं।

ja.name: Compound Finance
ja.description: Compoundはアルゴリズムによる自立的な金利プロトコルであり、暗号資産の貸し借りを可能にします。ユーザーはネイティブCOMPトークンを用いてプロトコルのガバナンスに発言権を持つことができます。

id.name: Compound Finance
id.description: Compound is an algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol that allows you to lend and borrow crypto. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native COMP token.

ru.name: Compound Finance
ru.description: Compound is an algorithmic, autonomous interest rate protocol that allows you to lend and borrow crypto. Users can have a say in protocol governance with its native COMP token.
